name: The Flood Era
description: This game is about the former professional player Yan  of DOD who accidentally met the artificial AI Marshmallow who lost his memory in the computer. Yan  took this opportunity to enter the online world to solve problems with the help of Marshmallow, and saw various network entities. In the alternating shuttle between the online world and daily life, Yan realized the influence of the Internet on reality, so he conducted an in-depth investigation, past experiences, the identity of Marshmallow, the mysterious network body, the puzzles followed, and Greater challenges await him...
